byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and SOMINI SENGUPTA

abstract: United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, responding to scandal over failure to promptly protect child sexual abuse victims, orders any sexual abuse by peacekeepers to be immediately reported.
lead_paragraph: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the high commissioner for Human Rights, said that he had ordered subordinates to inform him immediately when allegations of such abuse by peacekeepers arise.

headline.main: U.N. Wants Sexual Abuse Reported Immediately
headline.print_headline: U.N. Wants Sexual Abuse Reported Immediately

snippet: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the high commissioner for Human Rights, said that he had ordered subordinates to inform him immediately when allegations of such abuse by peacekeepers arise.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
